RTCRtpSenderDtmf.summary:
The read-only dtmf property on the
interface returns a
object which can be used to send {{Glossary("DTMF")}} tones
over the . See Using DTMF for details on how to
make use of the returned RTCDTMFSender object.
RTCRtpSenderDtmf.value:
An which can be used to send DTMF over the RTP session, or
null if the track being carried by the RTP session or the
as a whole doesn't support DTMF.Only audio tracks can support DTMF, and typically only one audio track per
RTCPeerConnection will have an associated
